amendment.description: Amendment strikes section 547 which provides border security funding for environmental mitigation along the southern United States border.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lummis amendment (A028) Agreed to by recorded vote: 238 - 177 (Roll no. 391).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lummis amendment (A028) Agreed to by recorded vote: 238 - 177 (Roll no. 391).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A028) offered by Mrs. Lummis.
